TC Title/ Objective: Verify that the system accepts all data as the requirments needs

2-Enter a valid data as mentioned in the requirments
3-Click the "log in" button.
Teast Data:

Password: sara@4569
Confirm password: sara@4569
Expected Result:
The system should accept the fields.
The user should be navigated to the next page.
